title: Old young man
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Douglas Cox and Michael Ahnemann
brief_description: Bill Bradley, like any young man, is sorting out his thoughts and thinking possibly of a career in public life. But Bradley isn’t just any young man. He is a nationally known high school and college basketball star, Rhodes scholar, and member of a professional basketball team. See Bill Bradley through his own eyes.
creator_credit_for_label: United States Information Agency, Douglas Cox and Michael Ahnemann
